title: Facial Hair Remover Stick Epilator Threading Beauty Tool
description: Every woman has undesired peach fuzz on her face, and every woman has gone through the pain and discomfort of tweezing, waxing or using harsh chemicals to remove that peach fuzz.This Threading Beauty Tool is designed to easily removes unwanted hair without harming your skin.  In just 2 minutes your unwanted facial hair will be gone!! Different from common depilatory device , this epilator could pull up  your fine hair by root. So you don't have to worry about the hair would send forth again in only few days.Using our epilator you can keep your skin smooth without the annoying fine hair for a long time. You can get rid of the removed fine hair growing thicker and tougher in few days. Given its excellent effect and convenience, this style of epilator is recommended by many female stars. With it ,you can remove your tiny fine hair thoroughly and quickly without pain.A natural, safe and convenient method to remove unwanted facial hair this Threading Beauty Tool works like tweezers except that it removes small areas of hair instead of one or two hairs at a time. No chemicals or creams are needed.

title: Crystal Glass Nail File, 5.5 Inches, Free Carrying Case from Sassella
description: Ordinary nail files create tiny fractures in your nail which can weaken the nail and cause the nail to split and become brittle. Because the glass file is so hard and the filing surface so extremely fine, you can file in any direction without damaging the nail. It will leave your nails incredibly smooth! Amazingly the glass file works very well on extremely hard nails as well as very soft nails. Since the surface of the glass nail file is so fine and uniform, regular use will actually help grow more beautiful nails, they will be healthier and smoother.

title: 2% Pyrithione Zinc Bar Soap - Noble Formula 3.25 oz
description: Noble Formula 2% Pyrithione Zinc Bar Soapwas especially formulated for those with psoriasis, eczema and dry skin, although it is an excellent cleansing bar for any skin type or condition.In addition to pyrithione zinc (ZnP) NF Bar Soap also contains a high percentage of nourishing olive oil, moisturizing mango and cocoa butter and a gently exfoliating oatmeal.Noble Formula Bar Soap is handmade, hand shaped and may vary slightly in size and shape, but will always equal or exceed 3.25 oz.Vegan formula.
